sentences.en: A deep gully between the two mountains can be seen from here.
sentences.cn: 从这里可以看到两座大山之间有一条深壑.

sentences.en: A deep gully cut by an intermittent stream ; a dry gulch.
sentences.cn: 旱谷被断断续续的河水断开的山谷;干涸的沟壑.

sentences.en: A few days afterwards a heavy wagon pass through the gully.
sentences.cn: 几天后一辆大篷车经过了这个小峡谷.

sentences.en: A few days afterwards a heavy wagon passed through the gully.
sentences.cn: 过几天后,一辆笨重的货车经过那沟.

sentences.en: A little stream of Knowledge trickled slowly through a deep worn gully.
sentences.cn: 知识的溪流沿着破败深邃的溪谷缓缓地流着.

sentences.en: A steep gully which may have snow or ice.
sentences.cn: 陡峭的小峡谷,可能重积有冰雪.

sentences.en: Churchyard gully freely, on any account rises and fall, upper broken up.
sentences.cn: 境内沟壑纵横, 高低起伏, 地表支离破碎.

sentences.en: Diversity was high in the semi - sunny slope, semi - cloudy slope, gully and valley.
sentences.cn: 在半阳坡和半阴坡和沟谷具有较高的物种多样性.

sentences.en: Gully - like features in a transition zone between plain and dune field.
sentences.cn: 沟壑,像在平原和沙丘之间的过渡区的功能领域.

sentences.en: He take off his shoes and wade across the shallow gully.
sentences.cn: 他脱下鞋子涉过了浅水沟.

sentences.en: It's unlikely that this gully was produced by nature.
sentences.cn: 这个溪谷不大可能是自然出现的.

sentences.en: One cut with my sea - gully, and the Hispaniola would go humming down the tide.
sentences.cn: 只要我用水手折刀一割, 西斯潘尼奥拉号就会被潮水冲走.

sentences.en: The bodies of the three climbers were located at the bottom of a steep gully.
sentences.cn: 在陡峭的隘谷谷底找到了3名登山者的遗体。

sentences.en: The creek had eroded deep into the little gully.
sentences.cn: 泾水把那狭窄的河床浸蚀得很厉害.

sentences.en: They clambered up a narrow gully.
sentences.cn: 他们爬上了一条狭窄的山沟.

phrases.tran_cn: 冲沟侵蚀；挖深浸蚀；雏谷侵蚀

trans.tran_cn: 冲沟，溪谷，[建]集水沟，雨水口，檐槽
trans.tran_en: a small narrow valley, usually formed by a lot of rain flowing down the side of a hill
